abstract: Stocks rise after report indicating hiring by private companies continued at solid pace in July.
lead_paragraph: But shares of Kate Spade and Crocs slumped after gloomy quarterly reports.
snippet: But shares of Kate Spade and Crocs slumped after gloomy quarterly reports....

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Higher After Hiring Report
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Gains After Hiring Report
